activities: A number of companies are served through RecoveryPlanner.com SaaS, and we collect business-related information for the general purposes outlined below. Activities vary according to the customer or service involved, but the vast majority of personal information that RecoveryPlanner collects is business contact information, due diligence and information related to customer training.  This generally is comprised of the users name, job title, business email and business phone number. This information may be used for a variety of purposes including customer service, enabling access to RecoveryPlanner's SaaS, and training. As part of RecoveryPlanner services, including consulting, education, and support, some customers may also allow us to maintain or provide us with access to their data. In connection with those services, RecoveryPlanner does not control the data and any access to or use of such data is incidental to completing its contractual requirements for the customer.
